text: Karl Lewis Glusman (born January 3, 1988) is an American actor. Glusman was born in New York City and raised in Portland, Oregon. His parents are of Ashkenazi Jewish, English, German, Irish, Luxembourgian and Swedish descent. ==Personal Life== Since 2016, Glusman has been in a relationship with actress ZoÃ« Kravitz. Kravitz said she had become engaged in February 2018. They were married June 29, 2019. They were married at Kravitz's father, Lenny Kravitz's home in Paris, France. ==List of movies== Year Title Role Notes 2008 The Iconographer Young thug 2012 Starship Troopers: Invasion Gunfodder Voice role 2012 Blow Up Nick Short film 2013 Summer House Andrew Short film 2015 Ratter Brent 2015 Stonewall Joe Altman 2015 Love Murphy 2015 Embers Chaos 2016 The Neon Demon Dean 2016 Nocturnal Animals Lou 2017 Gypsy Sam Duffy Television series 2018 Above Suspicion Joe-Bea 2019 Wounds Jeffrey 2020 Greyhound Post- production ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1988 births Category:American Christians Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:Actors from Portland, Oregon Category:Jewish American actors Category:Living people
